subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: This module contains workflow tasks for the plugin plugin-userassignment.

subsection.name: Task Type
subsection.p: (Userassignment) Assign a response : It is possible to configure this task to assign a response to the current user or to an entity of choice.
(Userassignment) Assign a response to the current user : Assign a response to the current user directly without intermediate screens.
